Name: A Rum Tale
About the game: A RUM TALE 'A Rum Tale' is the story of a pirate with a strong penchant for the bottle. After many years of searching for a cargo of rum claimed to be the best in the world, his adventures will eventually lead him to this island where many challenges await him. The road will be long and full of pitfalls. ARE YOU READY? 3rd person platform games. Overcome the trials to find the lost cargo. Many traps will block your way! No Save game! Checkpoints are getting scarce. Collect as many coins as possible to get a better score. Finish the game as fast as possible to get more points. In HARDCORE mode, coins will allow you to revive, if you run out of coins, you start over.
